title: Transparent Tribe deploys new remote access trojan in targeted attacks
summary: A known threat group has launched a new remote access trojan capable of spying, file theft, and persistent system control.

title: Cloud phishing campaign abuses Google Cloud email feature
summary: Cybercriminals abused Google Cloudâ€™s email integration to send thousands of phishing emails that bypass traditional filters and steal credentials.
points: Attack used legitimate Google Cloud automation to send phishing emails
Nearly 9,400 emails sent to over 3,200 organizations
Campaign leverages trusted domains to bypass DMARC/SPF
